quests.name: Inscriber
quests.description: The Inscriber is used to press items using various Inscriber Plates.

quests.name: Advanced Inscriber
quests.description: The Inscriber is used to press items using various Inscriber Plates. This one is more automatable though.

quests.name: Growth Accelerator
quests.description: Used to accelerate the process of purifying crystals, which allows you to create Pure Certus Quartz Crystal, Pure Nether Quartz Crystal and Pure Fluix Crystal.

quests.name: Growth Chamber
quests.description: Unnamed questUsed to accelerate the process of purifying crystals, which allows you to create Pure Certus Quartz Crystal, Pure Nether Quartz Crystal and Pure Fluix Crystal within its GUI and can provide regular fluix crystals provided with the materials.

quests.name: Silicon Circuits
quests.description: Processors made through the inscriber. Cores made with Logic processor.

quests.name: Me Drive
quests.description: This block holds 10 storage cells so you can tightly pack your storage into a very small space.

quests.name: ME Controllor
quests.description: The ME Controller is the routing hub of a ME Network. It is not possible to have 2 ME Controller in one ME Network. Multiblock Controllers can be build in a fairly free form, however all ME Controller blocks on a ME Network must be connected, the size of the ME Controller must be within 7x7x7; else it will turn red, and a ME Controller can have 2 adjacent blocks in at most 1 axis; if a block violates this rule, it will disable and turn white.

quests.name: Drive Fixture
quests.description: A smaller me drive.

quests.name: Crafting GUI
quests.description: The ME Crafting Terminal is the upgraded version of the ME Terminal which has an integrated crafting grid with access to a ME Network's Networked Storage.

quests.name: Fluid Interface
quests.description: As the name implies it will interface between the ME Network and fluid storage and transport systems, such as Fluiduct, Tank and Drum.

quests.name: Fluix Cables
quests.description: Cabling used for ME networks each holds upto 8 channels except the Dense version which holds 32 channels.

quests.name: Pattern GUI
quests.description: A specialized version of the ME Crafting Terminal designed to encode Blank Patterns into Encoded Pattern. The beginning of Autocrafting.

quests.name: ME Interface
quests.description: The ME Interface is the only component which can be used as a part, or as a Block. Crafting an ME interface in either form by itself produces the other form. The thin form is useful if you want to provide several different interfaces in a single block of physical space, but each will need its own channel. The block form lets multiple other blocks connect to a single ME interface, using only one channel for the interface.

quests.name: Particle Assembler
quests.description: The assembler is a powered machine which crafts items, it can be upgraded by inserting Acceleration Cards into it; once upgraded it is very fast. Functions in one of two modes, single pattern mode or interface fed mode.

quests.name: Crafting Units
quests.description: Is a component of the Crafting CPU. Co-processor: This can be used to make more assemblers active in parallel for the job, and thus increase overall crafting speed. These only help if your setup has steps properly separated so the system can run multiple tasks in parallel, or even split the same pattern across multiple interfaces.

quests.name: Storage Bus
quests.description: Connect this to chests and such, will allow the me system to look into its inventory.

quests.name: 1K Crafting Unit
quests.description: Provides 1024 bytes of storage for crafting.

quests.name: Exporter
quests.description: Takes items out of the ME system.

quests.name: 1K ME Storage
quests.description: 1,024 bytes of storage.

quests.name: 1K Fluid Storage
quests.description: 1,024 bytes of storage.

quests.name: 1K Gas Storage
quests.description: 1,024 bytes of storage.

quests.name: Spatial IO
quests.description: Used to capture and deploy regions of space that are defiend by Spatial Pylon.

quests.name: Acceleration Cards
quests.description: Causes AE mechanisms to process faster than normal.

quests.name: Level Emitter
quests.description: The ME Level Emitter can indicate either the level of a specified item or the ME Network energy level. You can set the threshold and if the ME Level Emitter will emit a redstone signal or turn it off.

quests.name: 2 Degree
quests.description: Used with Spatial IO Port to store spatial regions.

quests.name: 16 Degree
quests.description: Used with Spatial IO Port to store spatial regions.

quests.name: 128 Degree
quests.description: Used with Spatial IO Port to store spatial regions.

quests.name: Importer
quests.description: Takes items into the ME system.

quests.name: 4K Crafting Unit
quests.description: Provides 4,096 bytes of storage for crafting.

quests.name: 16K Crafting Unit
quests.description: Provides 16,384 bytes of storage for crafting.

quests.name: 64K Crafting Unit
quests.description: Provides 65,536 bytes of storage for crafting.

quests.name: Fluid Assembler
quests.description: Crafts with fluids if the recipe calls for aliquid like cake.

quests.name: AE Energy Cell
quests.description: Storage cell for AE power.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player has to craft specific items.

quests.name: AE Dense Energy Cell
quests.description: Storage cell for more AE Energy.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player has to craft specific items.

quests.description: 4,096 bytes of storage.

quests.name: Going Wireless
quests.description: A better Wireless terminal that can do more than just access your AE newtwork.
